DOC.brief_summary: This study is to evaluate effects of recruitment maneuver in patients undergoing robotic assisted radical prostatectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Recruitment Maneuver in Patients Undergoing Robotic Assisted Radical Prostatectomy
DOC.criteria: 60~80 yr American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status 1 or 2 scheduled for elective robotic assisted radical prostatectomy heavy smoker severe respiratory or cardiac disease hepatic or renal function impairment neurologic disease BMI > 31kg/m2
